QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, fin_burden_matrices.id odf_pk, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, fin_burden_matrices.DESCRIPTION as description, created.full_name as created_by, fin_burden_matrices.CURRENCY_CODE as currency_code, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, fin_burden_matrices.MATRIX_CODE as matrix_code, fin_burden_matrices.NAME as name, updated.full_name as updated_by, FIN_BURDEN_MATRICES.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.partition_code as partition_code, FIN_BURDEN_MATRICES.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from fin_burden_matrices fin_burden_matrices JOIN odf_ca_burdeningmatrix odf_ca_burdeningmatrix ON odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.id=fin_burden_matrices.id , SRM_RESOURCES created, SRM_RESOURCES updated where FIN_BURDEN_MATRICES.CREATED_BY = created.USER_ID AND FIN_BURDEN_MATRICES.LAST_UPDATED_BY = updated.USER_ID
